name: 陳冠薇　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
本課程將以華語譜系為視角，以中國現代文學的總體概述為起始，進行一場發現之旅。課程將以王德威的《哈佛新編中國現代文學史》為起點，進而回顧新編版本與夏志清《中國現代小說史》的異同，王德威如何繼承夏志清的工作，來呈現新格局、輻射的、「史蘊詩心」的中國文學史呈現。課程中將以四個作家為討論個案，分別探討魯迅、老舍、沈從文、張愛玲的文學地位，解釋他們在文學系譜上承前啟後的位置，以各種面向來看待文學作品對於當代文化建構的貢獻。
This course adapts a genealogy perspective and begins with a general overview of modern Chinese literature as a journey of discovery. The course will start with a introduction of A new literary history of modern China edited by Wang David Der-wei Wang (王德威), and then review how Wang succeeded Chih-tsing Hsia’s (夏志清)   work to present a new, diversify, and historically poetic version of Chinese literature history. This course will take four authors as cases for discussion, mapping Lu Hsun (魯迅), Lao She (老舍), Shen Tsung-wen (沈從文), and Eileen Chang (張愛玲).With further navigating their positions in the literary genealogy, the lecturer aim to address how their literary works construct contemporary culture.
